kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Open Application
kw.doc: Opens a new application to given Appium server.

kw.msg: Element 'id=md_content' text is 'This service requires a valid api-key in order to work. This means that this application release was compiled without a default key, probably due to licensing issues. To be able to communicate with this external provider you must go to https://openexchangerates.org and register: you will receive a free key.'

${dialogContent} = This service requires a valid api-key in order to work. This means that this application release was compiled without a default key, probably due to licensing issues. To be able to communicate with th...

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

arguments.arg: This service requires a valid api-key in order to work. This means that this application release was compiled without a default key, probably due to licensing issues. To be able to communicate with this external provider you must go to https://openexchangerates.org and register: you will receive a free key.
